name: The elder seed
description:
"The Elder Seed" is a voice-controlled RTS game, to play through the levels, and move freely through the game menus.

The player can use up to a maximum of 3 characters which are a warrior, a mage and a cleric.

Each character has its own abilities and special attacks, during the gameplay the player can move/attack/use abilities, which consume energy of each character, the goal is to kill all enemies and pass all levels within the game.

Plataform: Windows.

Genre: RTS, Role Playing Game.

Team size: Three members(David Olivares, Victor Casanovas, and me), students of SAE Institute Barcelona.

Project lenght: 6 months.

Engine and tools: Unity, Google Docs, Github.

Actively participate in game development, making design decisions for gameplay and game balancing.

In addition, I programmed the playable section, the logic of the turns, the combat, movement, and the behavior of the AI.
